name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Paul A. PLETCHER, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Paul A. PLETCHER, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 6th day of April, 1999, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted, limited to whether the victim’s hearsay statements of July 9, 1994 constituted excited utterances.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Jonelle L. Harter, Executive Deputy Prosecutor, Timothy J. Barker, Deputy Prosecutor, for petitioner.
casebody.head_matter:
729 A.2d 68
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Paul A. PLETCHER, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 6, 1999.
Jonelle L. Harter, Executive Deputy Prosecutor, Timothy J. Barker, Deputy Prosecutor, for petitioner.
